description.raw:
The most important part of this pull request is the `run_swarm.rb` script. 

* View the command line options: `run_swarm.rb -h`

* Example usage that clears existing log files, has a maximum duration of 2 hours for each test, uses 6 processes, stores data in `/data/swarm_logs/<time-stamped-directory-auto-created>`, repeats each test 4 times, and uses `nps` as the teams name.

```
run_swarm.rb -c -t 7200 -j 6 -d /data/swarm_logs -r 4 --team nps
```

title.raw: Improve performance, added a script to run multiple tests in parallel
